ing: 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "This quick and easy steak marinade is tried and true!! You will not be disappointed."
ins: Mix the hot pepper sauce, soy sauce, and Worcestershire sauce together in a bowl; season to taste with salt and black pepper, and pour over steak of your choice. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for a minimum of 30 minutes.
